title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed 
Payment Notice and Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) 
(No.4) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 31st day of 

December 2020.

title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and Dwelling Event
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and Dwelling Event 
Provisions) (Covid -19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 536 of 2020) are amended - 

(a) 

by the substitution of the following Regulation for Regulation 4: 

“4. 
Regulations 5(1) and 7(1) of the Health Act 1947 
(Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 10) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 701 of 2020), being penal provisions 
for the purposes of section 31A of the Act of 1947, are 
prescribed to be dwelling event provisions.”, and 

(b) 

in Schedule 1, by the substitution - 

(i) 

in column 2 of paragraph 3, of “Regulation 4(1) of the 
Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) 
(Covid-19) (No. 10) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 701 of 
2020)” for “Regulation 3(1) of the Health Act 1947 
(Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 
9) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 560 of 2020)”, 

(ii) 

in column 2 of paragraph 4, of “Regulation 7(1) of the 
Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [703] 3 

(iii) 

(iv) 

(Covid-19) (No. 10) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 701 of 
2020)” for “Regulation 6(1) of the Health Act 1947 
(Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 
9) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 560 of 2020)”, 

in column 2 of paragraph 5, of “Regulation 5(1) of the 
Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) 
(Covid-19) (No. 10) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 701 of 
2020)” for “Regulation 4(1) of the Health Act 1947 
(Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 
9) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 560 of 2020)”, and 

in column 2 of paragraph 6, of “Regulation 8(1) of the 
Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) 
(Covid-19) (No. 10) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 701 of 
2020)” for “Regulation 7(1) of the Health Act 1947 
(Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (No. 9) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 560 of 2020) (amended by 
Regulation 7 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 9) (Amendment) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 695 of 2020))”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 December, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and 
Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2020 (S.I. 536 of 2020) to 
provide for certain penal provisions in the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 10) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 701 
of 2020) to be fixed penalty and/or dwelling event provisions 

 
 
 
 
 
 [703] 5
